hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Did you go to university? medclick.com.br Buffett also advised students to stick with companies and industries that they know. "The most important thing is deciding what industries you can be right about," he said. Bill Gates couldn't convince him about computers, he said, but he did understand that people would continue to chew gum and drink soft drinks. "I'll stick with chewing gum," he said. "It's a terrible mistake to think you have to have an opinion on everything."
